title: Baby carrier
description: black, T-shaped panel; predominately decorated with horizontal bands of alternating floral and organic embroidered squares and tightly-appliquéd stars in squares, zigzag appliqué bands and organic scroll embroidered bands; trimmed in dark multicolored striped fabric and embroidered ribbon-like bands in bright colors; predominately royal blue strips separate main decorative bands
creditline: Given in memory of Lynn Swanson
